title: New Mexico Artists at Work
features: Through photos and interviews, this book offers an intimate glimpse into the creative spaces and minds of fifty-two New Mexico artists. Among those represented are contemporary painters, sculptors, printmakers, ceramic and textile artists, and video and conceptual artists living in the art capitals of Taos and Santa Fe, and in many remote locales throughout New Mexico.
description: is a writer, author, and artist whose collages have been exhibited in the United States, Mexico, and South America. She lives with her husband, painter Eugene Newmann, in Ribera, New Mexico.
is a photographer with a long career of documenting the cultures and landscapes of the Southwest. His photographs are included in numerous publications including
El Rancho de las Golondrinas: Living History in New Mexico's La Cienega Valley
Low 'n Slow: Lowriding in New Mexico
Spanish New Mexico: The Spanish Colonial Arts Society Collection
(all published by Museum of New Mexico Press).
